name: Pong-Like Game
description:
This is a demo game heavily inspired by Pong that I made in Unity, as a game-making exercise. This game does not follow the exact same rules as the original Pong. I have stopped working on this game a few years ago, I'm releasing this game "as-is"  for the moment (so you can expect to see a few minor bugs). I might finish development some day, if there is a demand for it.

Features:

- 1 or 2 players
- Keyboard and Gamepad compatible
- 2 people can play using the same keyboard

Recommended specs:

- Windows 10
- 8 GB RAM
- CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo Series / AMD Athlon X4 870K
- GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 6 Series / AMD Radeon HD 5830
* note that it wasn't actually tested on such low specs but I assume it would work anyways

How to launch the game:

- Unpack .zip archive
- Launch Pong-Like_Game_Beta_0.6 executable

Controls:

P1:
UP: Joystick Up / W
Down: Joystick Down / S
Pause: Start / Spacebar
Quit game: Alt+F4

P2:
UP: Joystick Up / Arrow Up
Down: Joystick Down / Arrow Down
Pause: Start / Spacebar
Quit game: Alt+F4

Known issues:

- If the cursor does not seem to move on the Menu screen. Use the mouse to choose "2 players"
- The screen does not adapt well to 4x3 aspect ratio. Select 1920 x 1080 resolution or equivalent (or the paddles will be off-screen)
- The PS4 controller is supported but the buttons are not mapped the same as on a Xbox controller. Press R2 to Pause the game
